name: Boxed Mail
description:
Created for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam.

DOWNLOADING THE GAME IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED, ESPECIALLY IF YOU STREAM/MAKE VIDEOS

Lore

He's fast, he's tough, he's... a cardboard box? Well actually, he isn't any of those things. However, he can sort mail. You may be asking, "Why can't robots do the work?" Well, they adapted from the humans, and they became lazy(no offense.) Since the robots don't want to do alllll of that work, they got the remaining humans to do the work, but I guess the box just wanted something to do.

  • Collect and sort mail into delivery trucks!
  • "Kick" the porch pirates out of the distribution center!
  • Use the delivery drones to get a small boost!
  • Get a high score
  • ?edom htaeD yeooG
Controls

Move - WASD/Arrow keys
Jump - Space bar
Q - Drop mail

lol see you later
